seo.title: About Us | Metales Del Sureste Andaluz
seo.description: Meet Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL: more than 12 years of experience in metal carpentry in Almería. Professionalism, quality, and commitment.

hero.description: Since 2012, Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL has established itself as a benchmark in metal carpentry in the province of Almería. Our passion for metal and commitment to excellence have led us to complete more than 500 projects successfully.

values.description: Our values are the foundation of everything we do and guide us in every project.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We use the best materials and techniques to guarantee lasting results.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: Highly qualified team with years of experience in the sector.

punctuality.title: Punctuality
punctuality.description: We meet the agreed deadlines in every project.

commitment.title: Commitment
commitment.description: We get involved in every project as if it were our own.

2012.title: Foundation
2012.description: Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL is born in Huércal-Overa.

2015.title: Expansion
2015.description: We expanded our services to the entire Levante Almeriense region.

2018.title: Automation
2018.description: We incorporated the service of automatic doors and security systems.

2020.title: Innovation
2020.description: Investment in state-of-the-art machinery for greater precision.

2023.title: Leadership
2023.description: Consolidated as benchmarks in metal carpentry in Almería.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Offer comprehensive solutions in metal carpentry that exceed our clients' expectations, combining artisanal tradition with the latest technologies in the sector.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the reference company in metal carpentry in southeastern Spain, recognized for our quality, innovation, and commitment to sustainable development.

cta.description: Contact our team and discover how we can help you with your next project.

seo.title: Completed Projects | Metales Del Sureste Andaluz
seo.description: Discover our metal carpentry projects in Almería: industrial structures, aluminum facades, artistic forging, automatic doors, and more.

hero.description: Each project is a sample of our dedication, experience, and commitment to excellence in metal carpentry.

nave.description: Construction of metal structure for a 2000m² industrial warehouse destined for the agri-food sector, with self-supporting roof and integrated ventilation system.

escalera.title: Ornamental Forged Staircase

puertas.title: Industrial Sectional Doors
puertas.description: Installation of 6 motorized industrial sectional doors with advanced security system for logistics center.

cierre.title: Security Enclosures
cierre.description: Manufacture and installation of security doors and decorative grilles for residential development of 20 homes.

parque.title: Municipal Park Urban Furniture
parque.description: Design and manufacture of benches, bins, pergolas, and decorative elements for the renovation of the municipal park.

escaparates.title: Commercial Showcases
escaparates.description: Installation of tempered glass showcases with aluminum framing for shopping center.

invernadero.title: Greenhouse Structure
invernadero.description: Manufacture of metal structure in galvanized steel for multi-tunnel greenhouse with ventilation system.

quick.description: We are available to assist you Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 20:00. For locksmith emergencies, we have 24-hour service.

hero.description: Manufacturing of metal structures, aluminum carpentry, locksmithing, artistic forging, and door automation. Over 20 years of experience in Andalusia.
hero.image_alt: Metal carpentry workshop with welding sparks

services_section.title: Integral Solutions in
services_section.description: We offer a wide range of specialized services with the highest quality standards to meet all our customers' needs.

about_section.desc_1: At Metales Del Sureste Andaluz, we combine traditional craftsmanship with the latest technologies to offer the highest quality metal carpentry solutions.
about_section.desc_2: With more than two decades of experience in the sector, we have become benchmarks in Andalusia for our dedication, professionalism, and commitment to customer satisfaction.

projects_section.description: Each project is an opportunity to demonstrate our quality, creativity, and commitment to excellence.

nave.title: Industrial Building
nave.desc: Construction of a metal structure for a 2000m² building with a self-supporting roof.

fachada.title: Aluminum Facade
fachada.desc: Complete facade enclosure with high-efficiency curtain wall system.

escalera.title: Forged Staircase
escalera.desc: Design and manufacture of an ornamental wrought iron staircase with railing.

puerta.title: Automatic Door
puerta.desc: Installation of an industrial motorized sectional door with a security system.

estructuras-metalicas.title: Metal Structures
estructuras-metalicas.short_description: Design and manufacture of metal structures for industrial warehouses, buildings, and large-scale architectural projects.
estructuras-metalicas.description: We specialize in the design, manufacture, and assembly of metal structures for all types of projects. From industrial warehouses to residential buildings, our team of engineers and certified welders guarantees safe, durable, and efficient structures. We use top-quality steel and the latest welding techniques to create structural solutions that comply with all current regulations.
estructuras-metalicas.subtitle: Industrial Strength
benefits: Ability to span large distances without intermediate pillars

features.title: Industrial Warehouses
features.description: Structures for warehouses, factories, and logistics centers of any size.

features.title: Commercial Buildings
features.description: Metal structures for offices, shopping centers, and public buildings.

features.title: Agricultural Structures
features.description: Greenhouses, agricultural warehouses, and structures for livestock operations.

features.title: Pergolas and Roofs
features.description: Lightweight structures for terraces, parking lots, and outdoor spaces.

faqs.question: How long does it take to assemble a metal structure?
faqs.answer: The time depends on the project size. A 500m² warehouse can be assembled in 2-3 weeks. Larger projects may require 1-2 months.

faqs.question: What maintenance do metal structures require?
faqs.answer: With proper anti-corrosion treatment, metal structures require minimal maintenance. We recommend inspections every 5-10 years.

faqs.question: Do you offer a warranty on your structures?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a 10-year warranty on all our metal structures, covering manufacturing and assembly defects.

carpinteria-aluminio.title: Aluminum Carpentry
carpinteria-aluminio.short_description: Windows, doors, enclosures, and aluminum facades with premium finishes and maximum thermal and acoustic insulation.
carpinteria-aluminio.description: We manufacture and install high-quality aluminum carpentry for residential, commercial, and industrial projects. We work with the best systems on the market (Cortizo, Technal, Schüco) to ensure maximum thermal and acoustic insulation. Our aluminum windows and doors combine design, durability, and energy efficiency.
carpinteria-aluminio.subtitle: Maximum Insulation
benefits: Maximum thermal insulation with thermal break
Wide range of colors and finishes

features.title: Windows
features.description: Sliding, casement, tilt-and-turn, and large-sized windows.

features.title: Doors
features.description: Entrance doors, balcony doors, folding doors, and lift-and-slide doors.

features.title: Enclosures
features.description: Enclosures for terraces, porches, and balconies with glass.

features.title: Facades
features.description: Lightweight facades and curtain walls for buildings.

faqs.question: What is the difference between aluminum with and without a thermal break?
faqs.answer: Thermal break (RPT) incorporates an insulator between the inner and outer profiles, improving insulation by up to 60% and preventing condensation.

faqs.question: How long does it take to manufacture and install aluminum windows?
faqs.answer: The usual timeframe is 2-3 weeks from measurement taking to installation, depending on quantity and complexity.

faqs.question: What warranty do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer a 5-year warranty on carpentry and 2 years on installation.

cerrajeria.title: Locksmith Services
cerrajeria.short_description: Comprehensive locksmith services: security doors, decorative grilles, fences, and personalized protection systems.
cerrajeria.description: We offer complete locksmith services to protect your home or business. We manufacture security doors, grilles, fences, and all types of protection elements combining security and aesthetics. Our team of professional locksmiths works on both new construction and renovations, adapting to the specific needs of each client.
cerrajeria.subtitle: Protection with Style

features.title: Security Doors
features.description: Armored and reinforced doors with maximum security locks.

features.title: Grilles and Fences
features.description: Grilles for windows, access gates, and perimeter fences.

features.title: Railings
features.description: Security railings for stairs, balconies, and terraces.

features.title: Locks
features.description: Installation and changing of locks, cylinders, and access systems.

faqs.question: How much does a window grille cost?
faqs.answer: The price depends on size and design. A standard 1x1m window grille can cost between €150 and €400 depending on the model.

faqs.question: Do you offer emergency service?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have a 24-hour urgent locksmith service for openings, lock changes, and repairs.

faqs.question: Can you manufacture custom designs?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We manufacture any custom design according to client preferences.

automatizacion.title: Automation
automatizacion.short_description: Installation and maintenance of automatic doors: sliding, swing, sectional, and rolling doors of the latest generation.
automatizacion.description: Specialized in the automation of doors and accesses, we offer complete solutions for garages, businesses, industrial warehouses, and residential communities. We work with the best brands on the market (Nice, BFT, CAME, Hörmann) and install all types of automations: sliding, swing, sectional, rolling doors, and barriers. Our service includes installation, programming, and preventive maintenance.
automatizacion.subtitle: Intelligent Comfort

features.title: Garage Doors
features.description: Automation of sectional, tilting, and rolling doors.

features.title: Sliding Doors
features.description: Motors for sliding doors up to 2000 kg.

features.title: Swing Doors
features.description: Automations for 1 or 2-leaf swing doors.

features.title: Barriers and Bollards
features.description: Access control systems for parking lots and enclosures.

faqs.question: How much does it cost to automate a garage door?
faqs.answer: The price depends on the door type and size. A motor for a domestic sectional door can cost between €400 and €800 installed.

faqs.question: What maintenance do automations need?
faqs.answer: We recommend annual maintenance including greasing, limit switch adjustment, and safety checks.

faqs.question: Can you repair any brand?
faqs.answer: Yes, we repair and maintain automations from all market brands.

forja-artistica.title: Artistic Forging
forja-artistica.short_description: Creation of handcrafted forged pieces: railings, stairs, furniture, and unique decorative elements.
forja-artistica.description: Artistic forging is our hallmark. We create unique pieces hand-worked by master forgers with decades of experience. From railings and stairs to furniture and decorative elements, each piece is a work of art combining traditional craftsmanship with contemporary design. Perfect for those seeking exclusivity and total customization.
forja-artistica.subtitle: Traditional Art

features.title: Forged Railings
features.description: Artistic railings for stairs, balconies, and terraces.

features.title: Stairs
features.description: Spiral and straight stairs with exclusive designs.

features.title: Furniture
features.description: Tables, chairs, beds, and forged decorative elements.

features.title: Decorative Elements
features.description: Sconces, lamps, mirrors, and decoration accessories.

faqs.question: How long does a custom forged railing take?
faqs.answer: Depending on design complexity, between 2 and 4 weeks from design approval.

faqs.question: Is forging more expensive than other materials?
faqs.answer: Artistic forging is an investment in quality and exclusivity. Prices are higher than standard iron but the result is incomparable.

faqs.question: Can you replicate old designs?
faqs.answer: Yes, we are specialists in restoration and replication of antique forging and heritage elements.

mobiliario-urbano.title: Urban Furniture
mobiliario-urbano.short_description: Manufacture of benches, bins, canopies, pergolas, and elements for public spaces and gardens.
mobiliario-urbano.description: We design and manufacture urban furniture for city councils, housing developments, parks, and public spaces. Our products combine functionality, durability, and aesthetics, creating more pleasant and welcoming spaces. All our elements comply with current accessibility and safety regulations.
mobiliario-urbano.subtitle: Functional Environments

features.title: Benches and Seating
features.description: Wood and metal benches, planters with seating, and rest furniture.

features.title: Bins
features.description: Recycling bins, ashtrays, and urban containers.

features.title: Pergolas
features.description: Pergolas, canopies, and shade structures for public spaces.

features.title: Urban Fencing
features.description: Pedestrian fences, bollards, and traffic management elements.

faqs.question: Do you work with city councils?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have extensive experience working with public administrations and are registered in the corresponding contractor registries.

faqs.question: What materials do you use for urban furniture?
faqs.answer: Mainly galvanized steel, stainless steel, aluminum, and treated wood for exteriors.

faqs.question: Can you install throughout Andalusia?
faqs.answer: Yes, we perform installations throughout the autonomous community.

manipulado-vidrio.title: Glass Handling
manipulado-vidrio.short_description: Cutting, tempering, and installation of glass for windows, storefronts, screens, and glass enclosures.
manipulado-vidrio.description: We offer complete glass handling and installation services for construction and decoration. We work with simple, double, laminated, tempered, and special glass for all types of applications: windows, storefronts, screens, glass railings, doors, and enclosures. Our workshop has state-of-the-art machinery for cutting, polishing, drilling, and beveling.
manipulado-vidrio.subtitle: Clarity and Safety

features.title: Window Glass
features.description: Double and triple glazing, low-emissivity and solar control glass.

features.title: Storefronts
features.description: Safety and laminated glass for businesses.

features.title: Screens
features.description: Tempered glass bath screens and office dividers.

features.title: Glass Railings
features.description: Railing systems with tempered or laminated glass.

faqs.question: What is the difference between tempered and laminated glass?
faqs.answer: Tempered is more impact-resistant and fragments into small pieces when broken. Laminated keeps fragments together thanks to an intermediate layer.

faqs.question: Can you replace broken glass urgently?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have an emergency service for replacing broken glass within 24-48 hours.

faqs.question: Do you work with special glass?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with acoustic, bulletproof, anti-theft glass, mirrors, and decorative glass.

metalisteria.title: Metalworking
metalisteria.short_description: Specialized works in stainless steel, iron, aluminum, and alloys for industrial and decorative projects.
metalisteria.description: Our metalworking workshop is equipped to work with all types of metals: carbon steel, stainless steel, aluminum, copper, brass, and special alloys. We perform cutting, bending, welding, turning, and milling works for industrial, commercial, and decorative projects. From small parts to large structures, we guarantee precision and quality.
metalisteria.subtitle: Precision in Metal
benefits: Work with all types of metals

features.title: Stainless Steel
features.description: Furniture, railings, industrial kitchens, and decorative elements.

features.title: Iron
features.description: Structures, grilles, doors, and construction elements.

features.title: Aluminum
features.description: Profiles, carpentry, and precision lightweight elements.

features.title: Special Works
features.description: Custom parts, prototypes, and restorations.

faqs.question: Can you manufacture parts from drawings?
faqs.answer: Yes, we work with technical drawings in any format (PDF, DWG, DXF) and can also create drawings from existing parts or sketches.

faqs.question: What welding certifications do you have?
faqs.answer: Our welders are certified according to EN ISO 9606 standards for steel and aluminum welding.

faqs.question: Do you do repair work?
faqs.answer: Yes, we repair metal parts, industrial machinery, and structural elements.

seo.title: Legal Notice | Metales Del Sureste Andaluz
seo.description: Legal Notice and Terms of Use of Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL. Legal information about the use of the website.

hero.description: Legal information about the use of our website and the conditions governing navigation and hiring of our services.

company_info.title: Identification Data
company_info.intro: In compliance with the duty of information contained in article 10 of Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Services of the Information Society and Electronic Commerce (LSSICE):

object.title: 1. Object
object.content: This Legal Notice regulates the use of the website metalesdelsureste.com, owned by Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL. Browsing the website attributes the condition of user and implies full and unreserved acceptance of all provisions included in this Legal Notice.

access.title: 2. Access and Use
access.intro: Access to the website is free. Users undertake to use the website in accordance with the Law, this Legal Notice, and generally accepted good customs.
items: Not to use the website for fraudulent purposes
Not to carry out illicit activities or contrary to good faith
Not to disseminate racist, xenophobic, or pornographic content
Not to cause damage to the provider's or third parties' systems

property.title: 3. Intellectual and Industrial Property
property.intro: All website content, including but not limited to:
property.outro: Are the property of Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL or third parties who have authorized their use, and are protected by intellectual and industrial property laws. Total or partial reproduction of these contents without express authorization from the owner is strictly prohibited.

responsibility.title: 4. Exclusion of Liability
responsibility.intro: Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL is not responsible for:
items: Errors or omissions in the website content
Lack of availability of the portal
Transmission of viruses or malicious programs in the content
Damages that may be caused by misuse of the web
Infringement of intellectual property rights by third parties

links.title: 5. External Links
links.content: The website may contain links to other websites managed by third parties. Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL is not responsible for the content or status of such websites, and access to them through our website does not imply that we recommend or approve their content. These links are provided solely for the user's convenience.

modifications.title: 6. Modifications
modifications.content: Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL reserves the right to make modifications it deems appropriate, without prior notice, to the content of its website. Both regarding the website content and its terms of use. Such modifications may be made through its website by any legally admissible form and will be mandatory during the time they are published on the web.

jurisdiction.title: 7. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.content: For the resolution of all disputes or issues related to this website or the activities developed therein, Spanish legislation will apply, to which the parties expressly submit, with the Courts and Tribunals of Almería being competent for the resolution of all conflicts arising from or related to its use.

cta.description: If you have any questions about our legal notice or need additional information, we are at your disposal.

seo.title: Privacy Policy | Metales Del Sureste Andaluz
seo.description: Privacy Policy and Data Protection of Metales Del Sureste Andaluz SL. Learn how we treat and protect your personal data.

hero.description: At Metales Del Sureste Andaluz we are committed to protecting your privacy and guaranteeing the security of your personal data.

responsible.title: 1. Data Controller
responsible.content: In compliance with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council, of April 27, 2016, on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data, we inform you of the following aspects:

purpose.title: 2. Purpose of Processing
purpose.intro: We process the information provided by interested parties for the following purposes:
items: Manage the sending of information requested through contact forms.
Provide interested parties with offers of products and services of interest.
Maintain the commercial relationship with our clients.
Send commercial communications about our services, provided they have given their consent.

legitimacy.title: 3. Legitimacy
legitimacy.content: The legal basis for the processing of your personal data is the consent of the interested party when filling out the contact forms and accepting this privacy policy. In case of a contractual relationship, the legal basis will be the execution of a contract. For sending commercial communications, processing is carried out based on the legitimate interest of the controller or the consent of the interested party.

recipients.title: 4. Recipients
recipients.content: Personal data will not be transferred to third parties unless legally obligated. No international data transfers are made to countries outside the European Economic Area. If any data transfer is necessary, the interested party will be informed in advance and their express consent will be requested.

rights.title: 5. Rights of the Interested Party
rights.intro: Any person has the right to obtain confirmation as to whether we are processing personal data concerning them. Interested parties have the right to:

access.title: Access
access.desc: Know what data of yours we process

portability.title: Portability
portability.desc: Receive your data in a structured format

rights.outro: To exercise these rights, you can contact us by writing to our postal address or by email at info@metalesdelsureste.com.

conservation.title: 6. Data Conservation
conservation.content: Personal data will be kept for the time necessary to fulfill the purpose for which they were collected and to determine the possible liabilities that may arise from said purpose. In case of information requests, data will be kept for a maximum period of 2 years from the last communication. Client data will be kept during the contractual relationship and subsequently during the applicable legal terms.

cta.description: If you have any doubts about our privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights, do not hesitate to contact us.

seo.title: Metal Carpentry in Almería and Levante | Coverage and Services
seo.description: Metal carpentry, structures and aluminum services in the entire Levante Almeriense area. Huércal-Overa, Vera, Mojácar and more. Premium Quality.

hero.description: We deploy our experience and craftsmanship throughout the region. From large industrial structures in Huércal-Overa to design enclosures on the Mojácar coast.

info.title: Leaders in Metalwork and Structures
info.content:
Our presence in the Levante Almeriense is no coincidence. We have been transforming spaces with metal, glass and aluminum for more than a decade.

We understand the specific needs of each location: the salt resistance required in Vera Playa and Garrucha, the industrial robustness required in Huércal-Overa and Cuevas de Almanzora, and the fundamental aesthetic integration in villages like Mojácar.

cta.description: Tell us about your idea and we will offer you a personalized quote without obligation.

seo.title: 24-Hour Locksmiths in Almería and Levante | Urgent Coverage
seo.description: 24h urgent locksmith service in the entire Levante Almeriense area. Huércal-Overa, Vera, Garrucha, Mojácar and surroundings. We arrive in 20-30 min.

hero.description: Full coverage throughout the region. Our technicians are patrolling the area to guarantee minimum response times of 15 to 30 minutes.

info.title: Comprehensive Locksmith Service in Levante Almeriense

warranty.title: Full Guarantee
warranty.desc: All our work has a written guarantee and official invoice.

speed.title: Absolute Speed
speed.desc: Mobile units strategically distributed to arrive faster.

info.p1: At Metales del Sureste, we understand that a locksmith emergency requires an immediate and professional solution. That's why we have deployed a network of qualified technicians throughout the province of Almería, with a special focus on the Levante area and the Almanzora Valley.
info.p2: Whether you need to open a door in Huércal-Overa, change a lock in Vera Playa or an urgent repair in Mojácar, our team is ready to arrive in minutes. We do not use intermediaries, which allows us to offer competitive prices and direct and transparent treatment.

cta.title: Do you need an urgent locksmith?
cta.description: We are available 24/7 to attend to your emergency

locksmith_page.why_choose_us_desc: We are your best option for any locksmith emergency in {{town}}. We handle all types of calls with the greatest speed and professionalism.
locksmith_page.availability_desc: Service available 24 hours, every day of the year.
locksmith_page.experts_desc: Certified technicians with years of experience. Damage-free openings and guaranteed work.
locksmith_page.prices_desc: No-obligation quote before starting. No surprises or hidden costs.
locksmith_page.locked_out_desc: Don't worry, a trusted locksmith is on the way to {{town}} to help you.

cta.title: Do you need a locksmith right now?
cta.desc: We are ready to leave for your location.

locksmith_page.seo_desc_1: If you need an urgent locksmith in {{town}}, you've come to the right place. Our team of professionals is available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year to attend to any locksmith emergency in {{town}} and surroundings.
locksmith_page.seo_desc_2: We offer door opening services in {{town}} without causing damage, lock changes, installation of high security locks, bolt repair and much more. We are specialists in all types of locks and security systems.
locksmith_page.seo_desc_3: We have local technicians who know the {{town}} area perfectly, which allows us to reach your location quickly. No matter the time or day, you will always have a trusted locksmith in {{town}} at your disposal.

huercal-overa.description: Metal carpentry services in Huércal-Overa. Specialists in structures, locksmithing and automation.
huercal-overa.longDescription: Huércal-Overa, capital of Alto Almanzora, has relied on our specialized metal carpentry services for more than 20 years. We serve both individuals and companies in the agricultural and industrial sectors of the area, offering custom solutions for agricultural buildings, greenhouses, homes and commercial premises.

testimonial.quote: Excellent work on the structure of our agricultural building. Professional and punctual.

vera.description: Professional metal carpentry in Vera. Enclosures, automatic doors and custom structures.
vera.longDescription: In Vera we offer complete metal carpentry services for the residential, commercial and industrial sectors. Our experience allows us to tackle projects of any size, from small renovations to large structures for the tourism and agricultural sector of the region.

testimonial.quote: They installed the enclosures of our hotel. Impeccable result and on time.

overa.description: Metalwork and locksmithing services in Overa. Solutions for agriculture and industry.
overa.longDescription: Overa and its agricultural environment trust us for their metal carpentry needs. Specialized in structures for greenhouses, storage buildings and irrigation systems, we also serve the residential needs of the area with enclosures, doors and security grilles.

testimonial.quote: They mounted the entire greenhouse structure in record time. Very satisfied.

vera-playa.description: Specialized metal carpentry for coastal area in Vera Playa. Anti-corrosion materials.
vera-playa.longDescription: Vera Playa requires special solutions due to the marine environment. We use special materials and anti-corrosion treatments to guarantee the durability of our work in this coastal area. Specialized in enclosures for apartments, hotels and commercial premises on the promenade.

testimonial.quote: The railings have been perfect for 10 years despite the salt residue. Great quality.

puerto-rey.description: Metal carpentry services in Puerto Rey. Specialists in coastal enclosures.
puerto-rey.longDescription: Puerto Rey, with its residential development by the sea, relies on our specialized services for marine environments. We carry out terrace enclosures, stainless steel railings, security doors and all kinds of metal work adapted to coastal conditions.

testimonial.quote: Spectacular terrace enclosure. Now we enjoy the views all year round.

garrucha.description: Metal carpentry in Garrucha. Experts in nautical enclosures and port structures.
garrucha.longDescription: Garrucha, a fishing village par excellence, trusts us for its metal carpentry projects. We work with the fishing port, promenade restaurants and homes in the area, always using materials with maximum resistance to the salt environment.

testimonial.quote: They mounted the terrace structure of our restaurant. Excellent work.

villaricos.description: Metalwork services in Villaricos. Enclosures, structures and custom work.
villaricos.longDescription: Villaricos, a charming small coastal village, relies on our metal carpentry services. We carry out work for homes, tourist apartments and local businesses, always with materials adapted to the marine environment and designs that respect the traditional aesthetics of the village.

testimonial.quote: Beautiful grilles that perfectly match our traditional house.

mojacar.description: Metal carpentry in Mojácar. Designs that respect the traditional architecture of the village.
mojacar.longDescription: Mojácar, one of the most beautiful villages in Spain, requires special care in any metal carpentry work. Our designs respect the traditional aesthetics of the white village while incorporating the latest technologies in enclosures, automatic doors and security systems.

testimonial.quote: The wrought iron railing they made for us is a work of art. Perfect for Mojácar.

palomares.description: Metal carpentry services in Palomares. Agricultural structures and residential enclosures.
palomares.longDescription: Palomares combines agricultural areas with residential developments, and we serve both sectors. We build structures for greenhouses and agricultural buildings, as well as enclosures, doors and locksmith work for homes in the area.

testimonial.quote: They built the structure of our agricultural warehouse. Very professional.

cuevas-de-almanzora.description: Metal carpentry in Cuevas de Almanzora. Complete services for industry and residential.
cuevas-de-almanzora.longDescription: Cuevas de Almanzora, with its rich mining industrial heritage, relies on our metal carpentry services. We serve both the needs of the industrial and quarry sector and residential projects in the town center and surrounding areas.

testimonial.quote: They completed the entire structure of our processing plant. Impeccable.

albox.description: Metal carpentry services in Albox. Commercial center of Almanzora.
albox.longDescription: Albox, the commercial center of the Almanzora Valley, trusts us for its metal carpentry projects. We work with businesses, industries and individuals in the area, offering everything from commercial enclosures to large industrial structures.

testimonial.quote: They renovated our shop window. It looks spectacular.

zurgena.description: Metal carpentry in Zurgena and La Alfoquia. Services for agriculture and homes.
zurgena.longDescription: Zurgena and its district of La Alfoquia rely on our metal carpentry services. The area combines agricultural activity with residential developments, and we serve both sectors with custom solutions: from greenhouse structures to enclosures and doors for homes.

testimonial.quote: Very attentive and professional. The windows turned out perfect.
